About Bunbury
Reserve Now
Full Name
(Required)
Email
(Required)
CAPTCHA
Instagram
This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
JOIN OUR NEWSLETTER
At Bunbury, you`e not just dining out;
you`re coming home.
As an Argentine restaurant and wine bar celebrated for being on Yelp’s top 100 list for three consecutive years, we blend the rich culinary traditions of Argentina with the warmth of grandma’s kitchen, creating an inviting atmosphere that makes every visit memorable.
Inspired by the creative spirit of Oscar Wilde, Bunbury is more than a meal; it’s a return to a place of comfort and familiarity where every guest leaves satisfied and eager to return.
Bunbury is the realization of a dream born from
a deep love for Argentina and its culinary heritage.
At Bunbury, we believe in the power of food to connect people, to tell stories, and to create lasting memories. Our menu is a celebration of Argentina’s rich culinary traditions, offering everything from perfectly grilled meats to handmade empanadas, paired with a carefully curated selection of wines that showcase the best of Argentine vineyards
Meet Paula
& Geraldine
Paula Costa and Geraldine Quint, the co-founders of Bunbury, bring a piece of Argentina to every dish served. With roots deeply embedded in Buenos Aires, their journey began with a shared mission: to share the warmth, spirit, and authentic flavors of Argentina with the world. Their vision was to create a place where guests could not only taste the cuisine but also feel the culture, the passion, and the soul of Argentina.
Paula and Geraldine’s commitment to quality and authenticity is evident in every detail of Bunbury. From sourcing the finest ingredients to curating an ambiance that reflects the vibrant streets of Buenos Aires, they ensure that every guest experiences a true slice of Argentina. Their dedication to excellence and unwavering passion for culinary artistry have positioned Bunbury as a beloved destination for those seeking more than just a meal, but a true cultural immersion.

“Occasionally,
fine wine and exquisite food
come together in just the right way.”
– Restaurant Guru
